availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sarah "Sally" Mullen (Nicholas and Fleming Counties, KY, washerwoman)

body.p: Fleming County and Nicholas County, Kentucky, washerwoman. Virginia native. Married to Harry Mullen. Mother of Isaiah Mullen and Joe Mullen. Resident of Fleming County in 1850. Washerwoman in Nicholas County in 1860. Resident of Nicholas County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fleming County, District 1, p. 329B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Nicholas County, District 1, p. 291.
KYR-0001-029-0439.
